TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LinearGradientBrush extends System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush
Public NotInheritable Class LinearGradientBrush Inherits GradientBrush
public ref class LinearGradientBrush sealed : System::Windows::Media::GradientBrush
.class public auto ansi sealed LinearGradientBrush extends System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush

summary.span: 使用线性渐变绘制区域。

span.span: Paints an area with a linear gradient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用线性渐变绘制区域。A paints an area with a linear gradient. 线性渐变沿直线定义渐变。A linear gradient defines a gradient along a line. 线条的终点由线性渐变的 和 属性定义。The line's end points are defined by the and properties of the linear gradient. 画笔沿此行绘制其 。A brush paints its along this line. 默认的线性渐变是对角。The default linear gradient is diagonal. 默认情况下，线性渐变的 为（0，0），要绘制的区域的左上角，其 为（1，1），即所绘制区域的右下角。In the default, the of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being painted, and its is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being painted. 生成的渐变中的颜色沿对角路径内插。The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path. 下图显示对角渐变。The following illustration shows a diagonal gradient. 添加了一条线，以突出显示从起点到终点的渐变的内插路径。A line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point. ![对角方向线性渐变的渐变轴](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "对角线方向线性渐变的渐变轴")![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") 对角线方向线性渐变A diagonal linear gradient 下图显示了相同的线性渐变，但具有突出显示的渐变停止点。The next illustration shows the same linear gradient, but with highlighted gradient stops. ![线性渐变中的渐变停止点](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "线性渐变中的渐变停止点")![Gradient stops in a linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "Gradient stops in a linear gradient") 具有突出显示梯度停止点的对角线性渐变A diagonal linear gradient with highlighted gradient stops 可以指定不完全填充要绘制的区域的渐变轴。It is possible to specify a gradient axis that does not completely fill area being painted. 出现这种情况时， 属性将确定如何绘制剩余区域。When this occurs, the property determines how the remaining area is painted. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 是一种 对象，因此可将其冻结以提高性能。A is a type of object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance. 有关 功能（如冻结和克隆）的信息，请参阅 "[冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)"。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview).

param.span: 如果值为 0.0，则创建水平渐变，如果值为 90.0，则创建垂直渐变。

span.span: A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象（或任何 对象）的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置线性渐变的二维终止坐标。

span.span: Gets or sets the ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.

value.span: 线性渐变的二维终止坐标。

span.span: The ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
The default is (1,1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沿直线绘制渐变。A paints a gradient along a line. 线条的起点和终点由 的 和 属性定义。The line's start and end points are defined by the and properties of the . 默认的线性渐变是对角。The default linear gradient is diagonal. 默认情况下，线性渐变的 为（0，0），所填充区域的左上角，其 为（1，1），即所填充区域的右下角。In the default, the of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled. 生成的渐变中的颜色沿对角路径内插。The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path. 下图显示对角渐变。The following image shows a diagonal gradient. 添加了黑色，以突出显示从起点到终点的渐变的内插路径。The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point. ![对角方向线性渐变的渐变轴](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "对角线方向线性渐变的渐变轴")![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") 对角线方向线性渐变A diagonal linear gradient ## 指定相对值或绝对值Specifying Relative or Absolute Values 请注意， 的 属性确定了其 是否解释为相对值或绝对值。Note that the property of a determines whether its is interpreted as a relative or absolute value. 的 指定 值相对于已绘制区域的大小。A of specifies that the value is relative to the size of the painted area. 的 指定 值用与设备无关的像素表示。A of specifies that the value is expressed in device independent pixels. 默认情况下，将 设置为 ，使 为相对值。By default, the is set to , making the a relative value. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: The starting two-dimensional coordinates for the linear gradient.
The default is (0, 0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沿直线绘制渐变。A paints a gradient along a line. 线条的起点和终点由 的 和 属性定义。The line's start and end points are defined by the and properties of the . 默认的线性渐变是对角。The default linear gradient is diagonal. 默认情况下，线性渐变的 为（0，0），所填充区域的左上角，其 为（1，1），即所填充区域的右下角。In the default, the of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled. 生成的渐变中的颜色沿对角路径内插。The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path. 下图显示对角渐变。The following image shows a diagonal gradient. 添加了黑色，以突出显示从起点到终点的渐变的内插路径。The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point. ![对角方向线性渐变的渐变轴](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "对角线方向线性渐变的渐变轴")![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") 对角线方向线性渐变A diagonal linear gradient ## 指定相对值或绝对值Specifying Relative or Absolute Values 请注意， 的 属性确定了其 是否解释为相对值或绝对值。Note that the property of a determines whether its is interpreted as a relative or absolute value. 的 指定 值相对于已绘制区域的大小。A of specifies that the value is relative to the size of the painted area. 的 指定 值用与设备无关的像素表示。A of specifies that the value is expressed in device independent pixels. 默认情况下，将 设置为 ，使 为相对值。By default, the is set to , making the a relative value. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
